item.title: About
item.description: My name is Adam Blumenfeld, CEO at CSX Labs. Mission Link to heading My mission in the world is to advance technology for humanity. I want to make as large of an impact as possible during my lifetime, and in my current situation I believe that the best way to achive that is through open-source. What I do? Link to heading I currently contribute to a vareity of open-source projects and promote open-source at my school.

item.title: Lockermatch
item.description: A locker assignment system for my school. Post in Progress
